name: Custodian Brothers
background:
The Custodian Brothers are the personal protectors of the Conduit, the heir of the Founder who created the gene-mods. Few in number, they use cutting edge armour and weapons, customized to their exact specifications. 

They serve as the Conduit’s personal guard and emissaries, delivering his orders and enforcing his will directly. The Custodians depend heavily upon their reputation and the trust that others invest in them. In order to maintain their status, they have slowly embraced intricate honour ceremonies, destructive rivalries and webs of lies and secrets.
backgroundFull:
During his rise to power, the Founder established an entourage of trusted acolytes. Each member was an individual of intelligence and skill whom the Founder trusted implicitly. They were the first with whom he shared his vision for an enhanced humanity, and his plan to achieve immortality by transferring memories and consciousness to a clone upon death.  

The Custodian Brothers acted as his confidants and representatives, and their word is considered second only to the Founder himself. Throughout the civil war, they served as his personal guards and emissaries to the loyalist Detachments.

When the Founder personally led a fleet to recover his stolen Flagship, the Custodians were at his side. They met the stolen ship at the edge of known space and a desperate battle ensued where the Founder himself was slain. Devastated by their loss, the Custodians fought with renewed fury, when at the height of the conflict, a wormhole opened and engulfed both fleets. The fleets then emerged in another galaxy, scattered and damaged.

The Custodians moved quickly to rally the remaining Detachments of Battle Brothers and to enact the Founder’s contingency plan: the Conduit Program. The Founder’s foresight and knowledge was proven, as his consciousness and memories were preserved in a clone. The Conduit became a symbol of the Founder’s vision and victory over death, which united the disparate Detachments in Sirius, while the Custodians continued to serve as the Conduit’s right hand in the sector.

The Custodians continue to serve a vital role as the right hand and voice of the Conduit to the followers of the Founder. As a result, Custodians value themselves and others according to the reputations they build, both within the Brotherhood and outside of it, above all else. To ensure their honour is recognized, each Custodian takes great pains to display signs of their achievements, keeping trophies and engraving their armour with titles.

While some might dismiss the Custodians as vainglorious, most recognize that it is only through their tireless dedication and diplomacy that unity is maintained. The Custodians stand as symbols of the Founder’s singular vision and reflections of human perfection that exist at the edge of genetic modification.

How will you defend humanity’s unity and honour in Sirius?

spells.name: Mind Gash

specialRules.name: Piercing Target
specialRules.description: Once per game, during this model's activation, pick one enemy unit within 36" and in line of sight of it, and place X markers on it. Friendly units get +AP(X) when attacking it.

specialRules.name: Steadfast
specialRules.description: If a unit where all models have this rule is Shaken at the beginning of the round, roll one die. On a 4+, it stops being Shaken.

specialRules.name: Stealth Aura
specialRules.description: This model and its unit get Stealth.

specialRules.name: Guardian
specialRules.description: When units where all models have this rule are shot or charged from over 9" away and take hits, those hits count as having AP(-1), to a min. of AP(0).

specialRules.name: Teleport
specialRules.description: Once per activation, before attacking, place this model anywhere fully within 6" of its position.

specialRules.name: Guardian Boost
specialRules.description: If all models in this unit have Guardian, enemy hits always count as having AP(-1) from Guardian (instead of only when being shot/charged from over 9" away).

specialRules.name: Hit & Run Shooter
specialRules.description: Once per round, units where all models have this rule may move by up to 3" after shooting.

specialRules.name: Shielded
specialRules.description: Units where all models have this rule get +1 to defense rolls against hits that are not from spells.

specialRules.name: Versatile Attack
specialRules.description: When this unit is activated, pick one effect: until the end of the activation all models with this rule in it either get AP(+1) when attacking, or get +1 to hit rolls when attacking.

specialRules.name: Unstoppable in Melee Aura
specialRules.description: This model and its unit get Unstoppable in melee.

specialRules.name: Shred when Shooting
specialRules.description: This model gets Shred when shooting.

specialRules.name: Shred when Shooting Aura
specialRules.description: This model and its unit get Shred when shooting.

specialRules.name: Unstoppable in Melee
specialRules.description: This model gets Unstoppable in melee.

specialRules.name: Regeneration Aura
specialRules.description: This model and its unit get Regeneration.

specialRules.name: Teleport Aura
specialRules.description: This model and its unit get Teleport.

specialRules.name: Hit & Run Shooter Aura
specialRules.description: This model and its unit get Hit & Run Shooter.

specialRules.name: Ranged Shrouding Aura
specialRules.description: This model and its unit get Ranged Shrouding.

specialRules.name: Tear
specialRules.description: Against units where most models have Tough(3) to Tough(9), this weapon gets AP(+4).

specialRules.name: Steadfast Aura
specialRules.description: This model and its unit get Steadfast.

specialRules.name: Guardian Boost Aura
specialRules.description: This model and its unit get Guardian Boost.

specialRules.name: Shred Mark
specialRules.description: Once per activation, before attacking, pick one enemy unit within 18", which friendly units gets Shred when attacking against once (next time the effect would apply).

specialRules.name: AP
specialRules.description: Targets get -X to Defense rolls when blocking hits.

specialRules.name: Stealth
specialRules.description: When units where all models have this rule are shot from over 9" away, enemy units get -1 to hit rolls.

specialRules.name: Unstoppable
specialRules.description: Ignores Regeneration, and ignores all negative modifiers to this weapon.

specialRules.name: Shred
specialRules.description: On unmodified results of 1 to block hits, this weapon deals 1 extra wound.

specialRules.name: Regeneration
specialRules.description: When a unit where all models have this rule takes wounds, roll one die for each. On a 5+ it is ignored.

specialRules.name: Hit & Run
specialRules.description: Once per round, units where all models have this rule may move by up to 3" after shooting or being in melee.

specialRules.name: Ranged Shrouding
specialRules.description: Enemies get -6" range when trying to shoot units where all models have this rule.

specialRules.name: Tough
specialRules.description: This model must take X wounds before being killed. If a model with tough joins a unit without it, then it is removed last when the unit takes wounds. You must continue to put wounds on the tough model with most wounds in the unit until it is killed, before starting to put them on the next tough model (heroes must be assigned wounds last, even if already wounded).

specialRules.name: Unpredictable Fighter
specialRules.description: When in melee, roll one die and apply one effect to all models with this rule: on a 1-3 they get AP(+1), and on a 4-6 they get +1 to hit rolls instead.
